customer_reviews.title: For peeling or rough skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my alligator winter legs or even my sun damaged arms. Works great. Definitely notice an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Adore
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and would go to any lengths to make sure I am never without it. It actually makes a long-term difference, unlike 99% of all other products out there -- there are only a couple of things that REALLY seem to make a difference: Tretinoin for face, Alpha skin care renewal for body (12% seems perfect) and the Ascorbic Acid form of vitamin c (pure as possible). After years of research, these are the only 3 products that have actually changed my skin to be younger. I wish for everyone over 50 that they could discover this for themselves. It is persistence and working out your own routine that creates actual change.
customer_reviews.author: kkatie

customer_reviews.title: TOO THICK TO GET OUT
customer_reviews.text: This product is so hard to get out of its container. I agree with many other reviews that said the same thing. You have to turn it upside down and smack it against your hand or something else to get the thick lotion out. Sometimes, you end up with too much. This should be repackaged into a bottle with a larger opening or in a jar so you can scoop it out.
customer_reviews.author: Remember Cecil the Lion

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to get out.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this cream but it is SO hard to get it out of the bottle even if you keep it stored upside down. So while I love the thickness especially in the winter, it is a pain to squeeze this stuff out. It does not come with a pump which is crazy to me. Only the 4 oz sizes come with a pump. If it had the pump I would have given it 5 stars. As it is, I will not repurchase but will look for a similar.
customer_reviews.author: Azongirl

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it’s meant to.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I’d tried using lower % acids, but only this will clear my flaky skin up. I’m usually like a molting snake, but this lotion makes my skin perfectly smooth. I use it every 2-3 days. My favorite exfoliation lotion I’ve tried so far. No more waking up with flakes!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: A Pump is needed for the bottle, otherwise, useless.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this Alpha body lotion a try after reading the review on beautypedia.com. The team over other loved it and rated it 5 stars. I'm giving it 2 stars -- it's heavy and a bit greasy to use during warm humid summer months, thought it dries after a several minutes, it leaves a tacky-feel to my skin. Lastly, the bottle is useless, hard to squeeze to get the lotion out, when squeezed too hard, a lot comes out. COULD BE..... a better product, IF.... the lotion was made better to leave a dry matte feel and the bottle has a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Dsunfish2000

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Like another reviewer
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Like another reviewer, I ordered this product after it was reviewed and recommended by Hot and Flashy on YouTube. I have been using it on my legs regularly since her review and it really has helped my skin appear smoother, less orange peeley, and improved the overall appearance of my skin. I am wearing shorts again! The ONLY little (itty bitty) issue I have is that it stings when you put it on freshly shaved legs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about one month, three days a week. I notice a small change on my legs which are covered with white spots. I have been told there is no cure for these white spots, they are due to over sun exposure. Instead of brown age spots I have white age spots. I worshipped the sun all my life and rarely wore sunscreen. The color is blending together a bit as well as dryness gone.
customer_reviews.author: Madeo311

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I previously used the 10% AHA for the face, but wanted to go for something stronger. I use this on my face, neck and chest every night. It is very thick, but a small bit goes a long way. You will feel a slight stinging, but I'm used to that with AHA's. It is very moisturizing. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick but great
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion for smoothing and exfoliating my arms and legs. I have very dry skin and this is definitely not super moisturizing but it absorbs quickly. The delivery system could be improved with a pump. It's hard to get out of the botyle because the lotion is so thick. If you have arthritis or pain in your hands, it's a oain to get the lotion out of the bottle. Orherwise, I love this stuff and will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t tell alpha hydroxy was working. Very moisturizing. Too heavy to use in the heat. Will use next winter for moisturizer. Wanted something stronger to put on sun damage on my legs and didn’t notice any effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Really Saw Results
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lotion. It has made a big difference in improving not only the appearance, but the texture of my skin. It has actually reversed discoloration from sun damage. I use it 5 days a week and alternate with argan oil the other 2 days. My skin is softer and more evenly toned. It took about 3 weeks to see the results of this lotion. It is fairly thick when it is dispensed, so I turn it upside down when it is about half empty. It rubs easily into the skin, not oily and it seems unscented. I am very satisfied and have it on Subscribe & Save.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: The burn means it's working
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this product BURNS!!! It only lasts for a few seconds, but I would not use if you have sensitive skin. I would also recommend waiting a day after shaving before using it. In spite of the burn, I really like the lotion. It has no scent, and it has worked well to soften my calloused feet.
customer_reviews.author: JulieK

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SKINCARE PURCHASE EVER MADE
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is orderless and uses no dyes or perfumes. It really is gentle and for those with delicate skin- don’t be scared of the AHA. I ordered the 10% body lotion and I honestly might have gone with the stronger 12%. I could not recommend this more! If you struggle with dry skin or keratosis pilaris this is the product for you! I was always told there was no cure for keratosis pilaris but after only 5 days, the bumps on my upper arm are nearly gone and only visible in harsh light. My skin also feels so soft and my partner commented on how nice it feels after using this product. I’m so truly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Wyattab

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: This product does not sink in and leaves my skin with a wet sticky feeling even hours later. This product has made no difference with my skin either.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for exfoliation and anti-aging.
customer_reviews.text: I use this lotion when I get out of the shower for exfoliating and anti-aging purposes. This bottle has lasted me about a year; I use it on wet skin and use it every other shower. It keeps my skin very soft. Using it along with my whole skin care regimen I have gotten compliments on my smooth skin. I am only 25 but for exfoliating and anti-aging purposes I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Enormous improvement in skin appearance and texture!
customer_reviews.text: If you have dry, flaky, or aging skin on your body this is a Godsend! I have all of the above and can see a huge difference in texture, moisture and appearance when I use this. I am a product “hoe” and have tried everything and this product is superior to, not only, other OTC moisturizers but beats the one my Dermatologist suggests.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Repurchased for the third time.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect consistency for a body lotion. Feels super moisturizing without being too thick or sticky. I hate the bottle cap so I put the lotion into another bottle that comes with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: nc

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE to use
customer_reviews.text: very thick cream doesn't come out. very annoying. sounds not so bad but after the shower, you don't want to fight with moisturizer...
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Saved my very dry legs
customer_reviews.text: My legs became very dry once the winter started. I couldn't stop scratching and started having many scars. I tried salicylic acid scrub, Dead Sea mineral scrub, salicylic acid cream, castor oil, jojoba oil, hemp oil, argan oil, and Aquaphor. It made the itching a little better, but I still had scaly, thick, dry, and cracked skin. I started using Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion, and I immediately started feeling/seeing the change. My legs are soft and radiant again and I'm so happy! I will buy this again. This is great for hands, heels, elbows, and knees as well.
customer_reviews.author: tFL

customer_reviews.title: All-day Hydration!
customer_reviews.text: This buys lotion is amazing! When I apply it on the morning, my skin feels hydrated the entire day! I like that is it is unscented so it doesn’t compete with my favorite perfume!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy P Stewart

customer_reviews.title: no pump but can be purchased separate.  Use for body only!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since it was sold at Ulta years ago (its not available in stores anymore only online.) I love this stuff. Great exfoliation for hands, feet and body. This is not for your face people!!!! There is a high percentage of glycolic in this.. it's geared for the body (neck down) . People have complained it needs a pump... yes its better used with a pump. On the company's actual website (neotericscosmetics.com), you can buy a pump for 1.25.. you just cut a little bit of the stem to fit and voila!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product especially for the appearance of dry flakey skin do to eczema. I used it about twice a week and it really helps the texture, moisture, and appearance of my skin. If you have sensitive skin it may sting momentarily but on sensitive areas like my face I mix it with my other face lotion to dilute it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Downing

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job for crepey skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the AHA to use on my legs because I started to notice they were getting a bit dry and crepey. I use a dry brush before the shower and this after. There is no scent and my legs are not sensitive to creams and this worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Max and Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I have very dry sensitive skin so I decided to Use something that could help, and this does, my skin is soft and moisturized all day long I use it at night right after I shower, I don’t use it during the day because i feel I don’t need moisturizer In the morning. I just wish it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft renewed skin!
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh! This is amazing makes your skin feel like a baby’s butt! I’ll never go back to any other lotion! I’ve ordered my mom some and have told my sisters about it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. You can literally feel this working, the tingle and slight burn. I love that. I love that it isn't scented cause I can wear any perfume with it. I love how it isn't terribly greasy. Such a nice thick consistency as well. Mine arrived all in one piece, no damage. Highly recommend if you're into chemical exfoliants over physical ones.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree M.

customer_reviews.title: I got this product after Hot and Flashy (Angie) recommended it, I was exceptical since I had been ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this product after Hot and Flashy (Angie) recommended it, I was exceptical since I had been using coconut oil on my skin for the last 9 years...but I wanted to do something different for a while. Well my skin feels awesome, I know this is not organic, but man this product is super good for your skin
customer_reviews.author: Ja9

customer_reviews.title: Best body lotion
customer_reviews.text: Alpha skin care is the best body lotion. I have used this over 25 years. My husband comments on how soft my skin is often. Sun spots rarely appear. I use "Gloves in Bottle" once a day and Alpha skin care after my shower. Both help build your barrier. You won't lose with this product. It is the best.
customer_reviews.author: devorah

customer_reviews.title: Key ingredients have great results
customer_reviews.text: This lotion contains ingredients for helping to reduce the appearance of wrinkles. It is moisturizing but not quite as moisturizing as other products. However, it is moisturizing enough considering the benefits. I use this as an all over body lotion daily and have for several months. I’m very happy with this lotion and the results of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently developed “strawberry” skin on my knees and in my research found that this lotion helps alleviate it. I cannot be more pleased. My skin is softer and the marks are noticeably lighter. I am very pleased with it and will purchase again. Note: There is a slight burning if you use on broken skin like right after shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Good for exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my skin exfoliated and soft. It shockingly isn’t too harsh despite it being 12%. I don’t use it everyday because I don’t feel the need to but I do use it maybe 3 or 4 times a week and it works well for me. I think as long as you do a test patch and start using it once or twice a week you can figure out what your skin needs and what you can handle.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: silky smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I used to be able to find this at drugstores and Bed Bath and Beyond. Hate having to pay more for it now through Amazon but it is the best smoothing glycolic lotion I've found yet. High percentage of glycolic acid. Neutral unscented unlike AmLac which works but smells horribly like ammonia. I will keep buying Alpha (used to be called Alpha Hydrox) as long as I can find it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for lightening spots
customer_reviews.text: I used another much more expensive glycolic body lotion and then I found this on Amazon. Way less expensive and works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for overall body moisture and exfoliation.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this smooths the skin. My skin is so soft after just a days of use. One thing I do notice is the smell of I apply to my feet in the morning, the chemical reaction of lactic acid and foot perspiration seems to create an odd odor. Yet I tolerate it because nothing else I’ve used works as well. Will continue to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results! I have used this lotion in then ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results! I have used this lotion in then past and will continue to use it twice daily . I have skin problems since I'm growing older and have fair skin. My sunburned past has resulted in rough, dry , and sometimes slightly discolored spots. This lotion helps to control these areas and keeps my hands silky smooth and soft. This is the best price by far that I've found in this type of product .
customer_reviews.author: sam termine

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to remove my red bumby skin, and I bought a second bottle after using it for a month. My chicken skin has been 10 years old, but it has obviously improved during the month of use. I will continue to use it. Go on until my bumby skin disappears completely. If you have to say that the bad part is that the lid design is not good enough, the lotion is difficult to squeeze out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foil seal completely undone.
customer_reviews.text: The foil seal under the cap was completely undone when I opened the cap. Then, I was curious about reviews and wondering if there was a version of this just for the face, and I ran across all these other reviews about broken caps, missing caps, etc. I wish I'd checked the reviews first. :( Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: The Mckeons

customer_reviews.title: the holy grail of lotions
customer_reviews.text: ive been using this lotion for years and i swear by it, this completely healed my psoriasis and keratosis pilaris. if you want baby smooth bump free skin this is the lotion for you. i just hope this company keeps making this product because if they stop im screwed.
customer_reviews.author: eeeeomer

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how well this lotion moisturized my 55 year old skin. The softness lasts all day. It stung just a bit on freshly shaved legs, so I’m not sure how it would react on sensitive skin. I’ve tried so many different lotions on my dry menopause skin and this is the first one that worked. I will absolutely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the only lotion you need.
customer_reviews.text: After one week of using this on my legs, arms and face I have come to the conclusion this is probably the best overall lotion I have ever used. You will still need a good facial routine but I have added this to my routine because my skin glows after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion, buy don't use daily if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but using it every day in certain areas made my skin extremely sensitive there. I ended up breaking out in hives in the area where I'd been using the lotion daily, after my skin there was exposed to an artificially scented oil. The hives lasted a couple months despite medication. My takeaway is that those with sensitive skin should only use this lotion 3-4 times a week, rather than daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this body lotion! I was skeptical about this product, I saw it on YouTube but man I’m glad I took a chance on it! The only lotion that I’ve used that actually makes me feel moisturized. It doesn’t really have a scent and It’s not greasy. It has evened out my skin tone and made my skin extra soft. Please try this lotion. It’s great. I’m on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shaquella Scott

product_meta.title: Alpha Skin Care Renewal Body Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula |12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For All Skin Types | 12 Oz
product_meta.description: Style Name:Renewal Body LotionALPHA SKIN CARE, Naturally powerful anti-aging formulas for real results to reveal younger-looking skin now. We have a rich history of offering products that deliver high quality and proven results. Our skin and hair care products are embraced and respected by both consumers and medical professionals. ANTI-AGING DAILY ROUTINE: Following an effective anti-aging skin care routine promotes cellular turnover and skin renewal to achieve a balanced, glowing complexion. Our four step routine - cleanse, renew, moisturize and protect – is clinically proven to reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles and fade dark spots caused by aging and sun exposure. CLEANSE: A cleanser is the most basic step in any skin care routine. Our face wash and toner naturally cleanse the skin and restore ideal pH levels to reveal a fresh, soft complexion. RENEW: Lifting away dull, dead skin cells is key to renewal. Our anti-aging products gently polish skin, allowing ingredients to quickly penetrate so new healthy skin can emerge. MOISTURIZE: A daily moisturizer helps to nourish and improve your skin’s health. Our moisturizers hydrate your skin quickly, leaving it feeling smooth and refreshed for hours. Create your healthiest skin ever with our naturally powerful ingredients. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (aha) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards. Caution: Avoid contact with eyelids and eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.
feature_bullets: ANTI-AGING FORMULA: Our unique anti-aging body lotion is specially formulated with the optimal balance of 12% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) and a ph level of 4.0. Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) is an ingredient derived from natural sugar cane which encourages collagen production and reduces the appearance of lines and wrinkles for a younger looking you. The product is free of parabens and fragrances

HEALTHY & RADIANT SKIN: It works naturally to gently lift away dead skin cells so new healthy skin can emerge and encourage the production of collagen to reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Immediately your skin will feel smooth, fresh and healthy and over time, you will see a more radiant, even skin tone.

THE POWER OF OUR INGREDIENTS: At Alpha Skin Care, we spent decades researching and formulating our products. We follow one simple truth – to use essential, natural ingredients with clinically-proven results to reveal healthy, younger-looking skin.

VITAMINS & NUTRIENTS: Our specially selected vitamins and nutrients are combined with our anti-aging ingredients to enhance the benefits you’ll see and feel from our products. Vitamins and nutrients moisturize and soothe your skin while our anti-aging ingredients work to reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles.

DIRECTIONS: Apply to desired areas of clean skin. Do not rinse off. May be used morning and evening. For daytime use, we recommend also applying a sunscreen to areas of skin that are exposed to the sun. First time users should do a patch test.
